    • Method Detail

      • visibleAreaOffset

        public static float visibleAreaOffset(@NonNull
                                      CoolPlayer player,
                                      android.view.ViewParent container)
        Get the ratio in range of 0.0 ~ 1.0 the visible area of a CoolPlayer's playerView.
        Parameters:
        player - the CoolPlayer need to investigate.
        container - the ViewParent that holds the CoolPlayer. If null then this method must returns 0.0f;
        Returns:
        the value in range of 0.0 ~ 1.0 of the visible area.
